==Features==
 * JD-T1800 (from Adafruit).
 * 4 buttons or one rocker switch
 * 20 pins connector compatible with TouScruino-avr or TouScruino-arm

==Joining==
When joined with TouScruino-avr, the complete assembly will have a double board thickness.<br/>
You should add a very thin layer of pastic (rows of transparent tape will do) on the back of the ui board to prevent electrical contacts.<br/>
Alternatively, you can have the UI completely separated from the avr/arm board and join them with wires.<br>
